species.name: pyroar
descriptions: The males are usually lazy, but when attacked by a strong foe, a male will protect its friends with no regard for its own safety.
The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
The temperature of its breath is over 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.
With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
